tooltip.infinity_nexus_greenhouse.greenh: Place this machine in a sealed area and meet the requirements
tooltip.infinity_nexus_greenhouse.fertil: This upgrade allows the greenhouse to automatically fertilize crops as long as the fertilizer slot is not empty
tooltip.infinity_nexus_greenhouse.irriga: This upgrade enables the greenhouse to automatically hydrate crops while its internal water tank contains water
tooltip.infinity_nexus_greenhouse.plante: This upgrade makes the greenhouse automatically plant new seeds when they are placed in the seed slot
tooltip.infinity_nexus_greenhouse.collec: This upgrade lets the greenhouse collect items within its area and store them in its internal inventory
tooltip.infinity_nexus_greenhouse.second: This upgrade increases the number of secondary outputs by 25% for each upgrade
tooltip.infinity_nexus_greenhouse.upgrad: §eThis upgrade does not provide any additional speed boost
infinity_nexus_mod.jei_information: §9This machine requires a component to function.
advancement.infinity_nexus_greenhouse.ir: No more hidden water blocks! Now you can supply water directly to the greenhouse
advancement.infinity_nexus_greenhouse.fe: Now you can speed up plant growth automatically by using fertilizers
advancement.infinity_nexus_greenhouse.pl: Seeds in the planting slot are automatically planted on farmland inside the greenhouse
advancement.infinity_nexus_greenhouse.co: Agora items dropados dentro da area não são mais apenas agrupados em frente a estuga e sim coletados para o inventario
